data.name: Metalfoes Silverd
data.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Set 1 "Metalfoes" Spell/Trap Card directly from your Deck.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
Sizzling soldier on a silver sublight speedjet. Can't track her, can't see her, can't escape that lightspeed laser.
